title: Does anyone remember the old man called the Goat Man that traveled through town a couple of times back in the late 1950s He had a small wagon that was pulled by goats that he lived in while on the road. A hermit type fellow. He paid his way by selling pictures. My father took me to Ogden to see him once.
text:
Unfortunately we weren't able to answer it. I apologize for the delay
in getting back to you.
